code","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"diff_CorpCurrencyCode"},{"control_type":"text","label":"ICM original close date","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"ICM_Original_Close_Date"},{"control_type":"text","label":"SNOWFLAKE ORIGINAL CLOSE DATE","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"SNOWFLAKE_ORIGINAL_CLOSE_DATE"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Diff original close date","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"diff_Original_Close_Date"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Icm total ACV","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"icm_TotalACV"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Snowflake total ACV","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"snowflake_TotalACV"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Diff total ACV","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"diff_TotalACV"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Icm total ARR","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"icm_TotalARR"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Snowflake total ARR","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"snowflake_TotalARR"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Diff total ARR","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"diff_TotalARR"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Icm total TCV","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"icm_TotalTCV"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Snowflake total TCV","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"snowflake_TotalTCV"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Diff total TCV","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"diff_TotalTCV"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Icm total TCV SEAP","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"icm_TotalTCV_SEAP"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Snowflake total TCV SEAP","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"snowflake_TotalTCV_SEAP"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Diff total TCV SEAP","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"diff_TotalTCV_SEAP"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Icm number of opps","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"icm_numberOfOpps"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Snowflake number of opps","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"snowflake_numberOfOpps"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Diff number of opps","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"diff_numberOfOpps"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Result message","optional":true,"type":"string","name":"result_message"}]

query.sql_select_query:
SELECT
  COUNT(CASE WHEN result_message IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) AS result_message_count,
  
  COUNT(CASE WHEN ICM_OpportunityID IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS count_icm_opportunityid_null,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN SNOWFLAKE_OPPORTUNITYID IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS count_snowflake_opportunityid_null,
  
  COUNT(CASE WHEN diff_Original_Close_Date = 'yes' THEN 1 END) AS count_diff_Original_Close_Date,

COUNT(CASE WHEN diff_CorpCurrencyCode = 'yes' THEN 1 END) AS count_diff_CorpCurrencyCode,

  COUNT(CASE 
        WHEN ABS(ROUND(CAST(ROUND(CAST(icm_TotalACV AS DOUBLE), 15) AS DOUBLE) - CAST(ROUND(CAST(snowflake_TotalACV AS DOUBLE), 15) AS DOUBLE) ,2)) > 0.00
        THEN 1 END) AS count_diff_TotalACV,

    COUNT(CASE 
        WHEN ABS(ROUND(CAST(ROUND(CAST(icm_TotalARR AS DOUBLE), 15) AS DOUBLE) - CAST(ROUND(CAST(snowflake_TotalARR AS DOUBLE), 15) AS DOUBLE) ,2)) > 0.00
        THEN 1 END) AS count_diff_TotalARR,

    COUNT(CASE 
        WHEN ABS(ROUND(CAST(ROUND(CAST(icm_TotalTCV AS DOUBLE), 15) AS DOUBLE) - CAST(ROUND(CAST(snowflake_TotalTCV AS DOUBLE), 15) AS DOUBLE) ,2)) > 0.00
        THEN 1 END) AS count_diff_TotalTCV,

    COUNT(CASE 
        WHEN ABS(ROUND(CAST(ROUND(CAST(icm_TotalTCV_SEAP AS DOUBLE), 15) AS DOUBLE) - CAST(ROUND(CAST(snowflake_TotalTCV_SEAP AS DOUBLE), 15) AS DOUBLE) ,2)) > 0.00
        THEN 1 END) AS count_diff_TotalTCV_SEAP,

    COUNT(CASE 
        WHEN ABS(ROUND(CAST(ROUND(CAST(icm_numberOfOpps AS DOUBLE), 15) AS DOUBLE) - CAST(ROUND(CAST(snowflake_numberOfOpps AS DOUBLE), 15) AS DOUBLE) ,2)) > 0.00
        THEN 1 END) AS count_diff_numberOfOpps
FROM Snowflake_ICM_Difference;

If No is chosen, the column schema provided will be matched to the order of the columns in the file from left to right.

input.subject: Snowflake and ICM Comparison Details
input.body:
Hi Team,

Please find details of Snowflake and ICM comparison below.

Comparison Parameters:

Fields: OpportunityID, CorpCurrencyCode, Original_Close_Date, TotalACV, TotalARR, TotalTCV, TotalTCV_SEAP, numberofOpps
Close Date between: '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"ace7f11c","path":["parameters","close_date_from"]}')}' to '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"ace7f11c","path":["parameters","close_date_to"]}')}'
Snapshot Date: '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"ace7f11c","path":["parameters","snapshot_date"]}')}'

Comparison Summary:
ParameterCount
Total record mismatch#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"csv_parser","line":"e72cad96","path":["lines",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"column_0"]}')}
Opportunity record missing in Snowflake#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"csv_parser","line":"e72cad96","path":["lines",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"column_2"]}')}
Opportunity record missing in ICM#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"csv_parser","line":"e72cad96","path":["lines",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"column_1"]}')}
TotalACV record mismatch#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"csv_parser","line":"e72cad96","path":["lines",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"column_5"]}')}
TotalARR record mismatch#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"csv_parser","line":"e72cad96","path":["lines",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"column_6"]}')}
TotalTCV record mismatch#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"csv_parser","line":"e72cad96","path":["lines",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"column_7"]}')}
TotalTCV_SEAP record mismatch#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"csv_parser","line":"e72cad96","path":["lines",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"column_8"]}')}
numberofOpps record mismatch#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"csv_parser","line":"e72cad96","path":["lines",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"column_9"]}')}
CorpCurrencyCode record mismatch#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"csv_parser","line":"e72cad96","path":["lines",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"column_4"]}')}
Original_Close_Date record mismatch#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"csv_parser","line":"e72cad96","path":["lines",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"column_3"]}')}

Please find the detailed report attached.

Download Snowflake_ICM_Difference Report

Thanks,
Workato Admin
workatoahq@redhat.com
